website_summaries.verdict: A security camera that can handle the weather and still offers you 2-way audio ability.
pros: A good camera with decent images in daylight or with night vision
Includes remote viewing and motion sensing recording
Allows you to adjust the zone for motion sensing
cons: The audio speak-back feature does not work through your smart home manager
You will need a smartphone to talk back

customer_reviews.title: Price and product are great!
customer_reviews.text: This camera worked just the way I expected. We have the netvue indoor cameras and this and those do not fail. Night vision is clear and alerts pick up all the way to the road. Easy set up both hardware and software wise. Only issue I have is my own home and the lack of outlet availability in a secure location. The pictures below are at dusk and complete dark.
customer_reviews.author: Kalwen

customer_reviews.title: I bought another, and will continue to buy netvue!
customer_reviews.text: I came back for more because this product is amazing! I can’t get over the price being so great. Typically the low cost security cams I stay away from but this one intrigued me. It is better then the $400 outdoor cam I ordered and installed for my dads house. This is an excellent product, I plan on buying more for the back yard and garage.
customer_reviews.author: Jackson D.

customer_reviews.title: problems
customer_reviews.text: nice camera picture is really good when it's well lite night vision ok. setup was not real easy could use better guide. after just problems now more problems and poor setup guides poor customer service. New 10/26/18 power supply quite working less then 30 days. App has alot of problems too. Do not buy this product. 4/5/2019 finally got tired of trying to keep it working so took down broke it up and put in trash that's all it's good for a waste of $60.00. So take warning DO NOT BUY THIS PRODUCT
customer_reviews.author: maint

customer_reviews.title: Had intermittent reception and now the camera does not work at all!
customer_reviews.text: Do not be fooled by the 4 1/2 star rating. "Motion detection" is literally triggered by winds so you receive motion alerts every 2 minutes. You also have to purchase their monthly cloud service otherwise you cannot access and download any of the recorded footage. Thus, the cameras are useless without a monthly subscription. As much as I am opposed to nickel-and-dime business models, I was fine with the aforementioned until I realized that the camera was not recording consistently. On any given day, it would be offline for like 20 hours. I spent weeks troubleshooting this issue with Netvue customer support reps and then...voila! It stopped working. In short words: Really horrible camera, really horrible customer service.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda J

customer_reviews.title: ONVIF but Requires Proprietary Software
customer_reviews.text: It's ONVIF, but it will only work with their proprietary software. I downloaded the app and got the camera online, but even after that I was unable to locate its IP address so I could sync it to my NVR. I just want A camera, not to be strong-armed into to converting my entire system to Netvue or using multiple apps just to see the Netvue camera. Total waste of time when there are so many equally performing IP wi-fi cameras out there that will work across multiple platforms, NVRs, and systems.
customer_reviews.author: Mike S

customer_reviews.title: Indoor units are great but this outdoor unit has been a huge disappointment!
customer_reviews.text: First unit had the screws stripped out on it. Second unit lasted less than 48 hours before failing, third unit never has connected. Now I have to ship it back. UPDATE: So they finally got me a unit that I was able to connect and use for about 6 months. It is out again, same problem as before. Will not power up and connect to my wireless. I'll be returning this unit again. Their indoor Orbs are great though!
customer_reviews.author: Daniel M. Bertke

customer_reviews.title: Must have account with this company to view the video?
customer_reviews.text: No thanks. I know of other products that do not require signing up for an account to view the videos. Really not interested in having cloud access etc etc.
customer_reviews.author: blahblahblah

customer_reviews.title: junk
customer_reviews.text: This camera comes with a 3 cord, huge wire that cannot be hidden, a very short power adapter and an inability to connect to a router less than 20 feet away. it will connect just fine in the house, but outside, forget it. Which, In my opinion is no good for an outdoor camera. I had an outlet less than 10 feet away and a router in the house less than 20 linear feet away and it couldn't reach either. Waste of money, piece of junk. Even worse, it wouldn't work with the app for my 4 other cameras. I'm sorry I bought it, and now it's too late to return.
customer_reviews.author: Yon Yohnson

customer_reviews.title: This REQUIRES a subscription!
customer_reviews.text: From Level 2 customer service: Thanks for contacting with us. Your sd card is working on the camera. We apologize but the SD card cannot be configured for Motion recording. SD card will only do continuous recording and cannot be configured for motion detection. If you won't subscribe to the Motion video cloud, yes the notification will still work but you will only get still images on motion detection rather than the video. Netvue support
customer_reviews.author: Henry

customer_reviews.title: New version working well
customer_reviews.text: Setup was rather difficult. Camera seems to be of good quality. Was only able to get it to work hard wired to the router. After many attempts to setup wireless, I gave up and returned the item. App seemed okay as well as Alexa integration. However, was unable to test these features to their full extent. UPDATE: Received a replacement unit that's claimed to be update. Device looked identical to the original which is to say nice and sturdy. Setup went much easier and connection to my network worked great. Image quality is good and features are nice. I'm happy with the camera and customer support was outstanding.
customer_reviews.author: Michael L. Likens

customer_reviews.title: Nope not worth it.
customer_reviews.text: Don't waste your money. The camera are a joke the range is a joke. The sound stinks especially from you to the outside. And if you want to pay a bill every month for something you can get for free with other wireless four camera setups with a hard drive software to send to your phone and monitor. Its not worth the money for how cheap you can get the other systems now. Even the cheapest wired four camera setup is better than having to buy four of these things. Ring is the only camera that i would buy if this is how you have to have cameras
customer_reviews.author: AClinton

customer_reviews.title: Net Vue Outdoor Camera Less Than Worthless
customer_reviews.text: Product support is non existent. The application, for Android, requires a request to be sent to email. The email is never sent after repeated attempts for days and hours. The extreme worthless supports, "states try again, and if that does not work, use IOS" ! Yes, this is NOT an exaggeration. Fortunately amazon.com is granting a refund for their extreme junk, that has worthless support. Support does not even care if their application functions or not. Just state, "use IOS if it does not work" Really?! I wasted hours and days for a camera that does not have a functioning application for Android.
customer_reviews.author: Ted's Reviews

customer_reviews.title: Always dropping out
customer_reviews.text: I would like to write a good review but !! These cameras are Constantly dropping out not connected to the Wi-Fi you have to go to a whole process to get them connected then lo and behold the next week they drop out again and it’s always when you need to look at the camera the most package delivered or someone coming to your door the camera is not working so as far as I’m concerned they are not reliable and I will be looking for another camera
customer_reviews.author: read a lot

customer_reviews.title: Good product ruined by poor software
customer_reviews.text: Likely returning this product. Don’t waste your money until they fix their firmware. I bought this camera based on its reviews and cost. Initial thoughts were great. Setup was easy and picture quality is good enough. Integration with Fire Cube is also very cool. After four days of use, I’m very frustrated. The motion detection (which I believe is the most important aspect of a security camera) is atrocious. I have the sensitivity set as low as possible, yet I get at least 20 to 30 false notifications a day. For an outdoor security camera, it should be intelligent enough to not trigger motion detection every time the sun is blocked by a cloud.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Andrews

customer_reviews.title: Poor tech support
customer_reviews.text: I received the camera and the camera appears to be good quality out of the box. However when I plug the camera in and follow the instructions to connect the wifi, the camera doesn't even try to connect. So I actually then connected the camera straight to my internet through the ethernet connection and it still wont connect. I've contacted customer service and now waiting for a response. As of now I'm very dissatisfied with this product. I've ordered a number of different items through Amazon as I am a prime member and this is the first time that I am not satisfied. I will update this review as needed. As of now, dont purchase this headache.
customer_reviews.author: Rick

customer_reviews.title: Good product for the price
customer_reviews.text: This Netvue camera has been a great addition to the security and safety of my neighborhood. It always sends me motion detection notification and allows me to check recordings later on remotely. A few limitations with this product are that: 1. The night vision is not as clear as it was the first day it was installed. You can barely see anything unless a car with headlights passes through. 2. The camera turns on and off randomly and thus, does not allow me to view the footage remotely. Other than this, the product is pretty great for the money. Thank you, Rehnuma
customer_reviews.author: REHNEW

customer_reviews.title: Not working
customer_reviews.text: These cameras worked when I initially purchased them in September of 2019. After owning them for 10 months I was able to install them but they were not working. I contacted customer service, I went through all troubleshooting steps, and nothing. I decided to purchase a different set of cameras, different brand, and these worked fine. The downside is they don’t have the two way audio function these do. I tried to get some help with these from customer service once again but was told a level 2 tech would reach out but I haven’t heard back.
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: Fairly easy set up if you have a strong wifi signal
customer_reviews.text: I set this up after buying a wifi booster because it was attached to the exterior of my dining room sliders. It was not close to my router. I ordered a wifi signal booster from Amazon and that did the trick. I plugged it in an interior outlet near the camera. If you don't have a strong wifi signal, set up may be more problematic. Also, in order to set it up, the green light must be flashing. If it doesn't unplug the power source and plug it back in to reboot. I have a good home security system on this wireless outdoor camera is a great enhancement.
customer_reviews.author: The Gabster

customer_reviews.title: You can't view on desktop
customer_reviews.text: Update: I have spoken to customer care and they are working on this I want to love this camera. Really I do. But so far, I just don't. I feel like, for 60 bucks, I should be able to watch this camera from anywhere. I have cameras I paid more for and less for, all of which I can go to the ip address and port and watch from anywhere. This...not so much. It's restrictive, and I dont like that. That said....it was 60 bucks and its fine as long as I remember to grab my phone.
customer_reviews.author: Amiee

customer_reviews.title: Terrible Customer service
customer_reviews.text: They will never answer the phone and even in live chats will not work you through the problem. went through the complete setup, Get to the last step (Device Binding) and it fails. This is the second one vigil outdoor cam. I have several Wyze Cams and they have Great Customer Service, you can actually talk to a person, or they get right back to you. Update: I was told the streaks of light I was getting notices on were a bug or nat flew by the cam, and that it won't notify of any movement for 5 minutes.. Now that's some Great security cam.
customer_reviews.author: Jay

customer_reviews.title: 24/7 view of my door, even when I'm away
customer_reviews.text: I love this NetVue Bullet outdoor camera. It is very easy to install using the quick start guide. Installed the app. Then connected camera easily to my wifi (2.4 ghz only) then took outside to install. Three easy screws into the wood, plugged into outdoor socket and that was it! I can now see my entry way and two way audio is a plus. My favorite feature is the motion detection alerts. Excellent value for an outdoor camera with so many great features!
customer_reviews.author: Mom

customer_reviews.title: Worst purchase ever
customer_reviews.text: I did not realize when I ordered this that it was not battery operated (my fault). However it is super inconvenient to have to try and plug it in. Also, it is not staying connected to my WiFi, so rough start. We’ll see if it gets better. * Update - I gave it another day, hasn’t connected to my Wi-Fi once. So I tried to unscrew it from my wall which was a disaster because the screws were so cheap that they stripped out instantly and I had to pry them out. After sitting directly next to my router it still wouldn’t connect so I called customer service, who would never answer the phone. I am returning.
customer_reviews.author: Allissa Keoughan

customer_reviews.title: Camera is great; software is adequate
customer_reviews.text: Wifi connection works great! I would like to see a bit better fine-grain control on motion detection. If you want to save any portion of video, you record the playback -- it can be difficult to get the clip you want. The company sends advertisement to my email address (which I was able to opt out) and they're always pushing ads in their software. Meets my needs, but I'd look for a different solution next time, with more research on the software.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Adequate cameras with lame software and limited "free" features
customer_reviews.text: Motion detection requires cloud service for each camera - which can be very expensive for a multi-camera system. In addition, there is no desktop app - why? Would not buy again. Would not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Rusty Shackleford

customer_reviews.title: SUCCESSFUL WIRELESS SET-UP
customer_reviews.text: After many "failure to connect" messages trying to set-up my wireless connection to the camera, I was about to return it. I tried one more time by setting it up WIRED first, then updating the firmware, then unplugging the Ethernet cable and then finally changing it to WIRELESS in the settings. It worked! 3 stars because the instructions are lame. I had to laugh at myself for trying to scan the bar code in the pamphlet instead of on the camera! LOL and then when I finally noticed the green flashing light ON THE CABLE that it was asking about. Picture is great especially for the price. Hope they fix the instructions.
customer_reviews.author: Maxoom

customer_reviews.title: Ehhh buy at your own risk
customer_reviews.text: Seemed to be a great camera but wasn’t connecting to my WIFI and the really big antenna wasn’t easy to snug it in a corner if you’re trying to mount it outside. Overall had to return it, wasn’t sure if I received a defective camera but it didn’t work for me. Ended up buying a BLINK Camera...So much better and worth the money
customer_reviews.author: Miguel Martinez

customer_reviews.title: Inablity to Turn Off IR at Night FATAL FLAW
customer_reviews.text: I received this camera and set it up fairly easily (despite some fussing over connecting to my WiFi). It works okay, but has one MAJOR FLAW. I believe it is impossible to turn off the IR lights at night. Even if I set the Night Vision Mode to "Always Day", the IR lights remain on whenever it's dark. Completely unacceptable for my application. Thing is, it's got to be a very simple software fix to disable the IR lights whenever "Always Day" is selected. Why the manufacturer still has not made this change defies reasonable explanation. The other cameras I use (such as Wyse), support disabling the IR lights at night. I will be returning the camera.
customer_reviews.author: Rob from California

customer_reviews.title: Fast, Simple install from out of the box to operational.
customer_reviews.text: I've tried 2 battery operated Doorbell Cameras and 1 other battery operated Outdoor Camera. This WIRED, non-battery operated Netvue camera is far and away the easiest and fastest out-of-the-box to working than the others. This camera MUST be plugged into an electrical outlet. It does NOT operate on batteries which is a GOOD thing because the battery operated units I've tried begin to "falter" after only about 25% of the battery used.
customer_reviews.author: Brusky 1995

customer_reviews.title: Does not stay on, beware before buying
customer_reviews.text: Keeps shutting off and I have to manually reset. Yes, it has constant power from my home. No, it is not caused by my own issues. What’s the point of a security cam if it’s off 90% of the time. Returning this garbage.
customer_reviews.author: Brendan

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy!
customer_reviews.text: Bought a few months ago. Worked for 3 weeks then went offline. Not easy to get it back online. Had to do a whole reset, climb a ladder to hold my phone with a QR code to the camera, etc. But the problem is it goes offline ALL the time! It’s right above our router so the signal is strong. Just so tired of messing with it. Plus it never has caught the raccoon that keeps getting my goldfish! 🙁 Been trying to see where its coming from. But I have HUNDREDS of snapshots of moths flying by!
customer_reviews.author: Traci C

customer_reviews.title: Here we go again...
customer_reviews.text: This camera has given me a TON of issues. It won't turn on anymore whatsoever. No light, no charge, no way to reset etc etc. The last time I went through this, I was sent a new charger, but at this point it is clear it is more than just a charge. Unfortunately, there was foul play RIGHT in front of my camera that of course, was not caught, due to the issues that I described. Please can the support team come through and replace this faulty camera?
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Harrell

customer_reviews.title: Netvue is the clear choice!
customer_reviews.text: This Netvue camera product line is great, and this outdoor camera is no different. I’ve been a satisfied Netvue customer for over two years. I had the Vuebell doorbell camera first, and was extremely happy with it. I just pulled the trigger on this outdoor camera for the driveway. They both snap pictures every time they sense motion & sends a pic right to the phone app. And you also have the live view with the option to pay monthly for the cloud video recording for 24/7 recording. I never used the “Ring” doorbell, but I LOVE the Netvue series of cameras & suggest you check out these cameras.
customer_reviews.author: A. M. Shelley

customer_reviews.title: After 4 days I still can’t connect it
customer_reviews.text: I followed instructions, I watched the videos on how to set it up and it’s not connecting. Contacted customer service multiple times they said I need to get another phone and use hotspot. I’m single mom I don’t have two phones 🤦🏼‍♀️ Every time I contact customer service they say it will be 12 hours before I get a response. RIDICULOUS Now they’re emailing me telling me they will refund my money ONLY if I delete my negative reviews
customer_reviews.author: Tiffiney K

customer_reviews.title: Stay clear of camera and company!
customer_reviews.text: It looks like it should be a great camera. Unfortunately mine is unusable. I should first say I own 5 security cameras from 3 different brands and have never had any problems like this. The recordings are very choppy. Playback from an SD card is so slow that the unit mostly freezes. Honestly, this is a piece of junk. Customer support is horrible.
customer_reviews.author: M. Allison

customer_reviews.title: Camera OK, wiring and mount poorly designed
customer_reviews.text: The camera works fine. We bought it to monitor a waterfowl nest. After hatching I moved it under my driveway eaves and that’s when mounting issues became clear. 1) The WiFi antenna can’t point upwards, its 3x the length of the mount; it should be designed to point down. 2) The tri-connector wiring is a big blob of weight and bulk; I added a ring into the woodwork to tie wrap all the bulk. 3) It would really help if the base could be mounted and *then* the camera attached. It’s just clear that whoever designed this never tried to mount it in a real environment.
customer_reviews.author: Jerry Loyd

customer_reviews.title: Great picture quality/poor motion detection control.
customer_reviews.text: I have been using now for a few months. Picture quality is great. Initial wifi setup was easy. However motion sensitivity continues to be a constant challenge as well as an app update that took my unit down for over a week on my Android phone.. The customer service has been ok. Just to much work in having to adjust motion sensitivity constantly.. The good news is I purchased as a test unit and now will probably try a different manufacturer as I increase my number of cameras. Another note. Received an app update yesterday. Had to reboot the camera (again). Also, I do like the 128Gb memory card capability. Motion detection control is the big issue.
customer_reviews.author: dbld

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Outdoor Camera
customer_reviews.text: This camera far exceeds my expectations. The picture quality is superb. The sound quality is also great. You can understand the words perfectly when you are talking to another person through the camera loud and clear. I am able to move it around to see all angles needed in my driveway. The motion detection works great. As soon as someone enters my driveway or leaves my phone will notify me. I love that I can customize it to set different times for the motion detection to be on or off. I would highly recommend this camera to anyone in the market. You can’t beat the price for the quality of the product.
customer_reviews.author: Kristal J

customer_reviews.title: Works as promised
customer_reviews.text: Fairly easy to install, with a couple of hiccups (which we overcame) during the initial connection to wifi. Works as advertised. Once you play around with the app a bit, it becomes easy to set up alerts when the motion sensor detects movement. Picture quality is pretty good, two-way sound works. Can view activity from anywhere. Great value for the price, will definitely be buying more of these for the perimeter of the house. When wifi went down, had to unplug and replug the camera to get it to reconnect. Otherwise it's been seamless operation since startup.
customer_reviews.author: C. Estes

customer_reviews.title: Difficult to install but Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Hard to setup... didn't like my modem. Would not connect to WiFi by following it own instructions.. Finally WiFi connected only after having to repeating certain alternative steps in the manual. The modem that it originally would not connect to; finally got connected using that modem. However now that it is finally working it was definitely worth the time and effort. I can speak to people in my driveway or porch. The video is very clear. It is quite perfect. Works on both my Android and Apple Tablets.
customer_reviews.author: DavidTop Contributor: Woodworking

customer_reviews.title: Easy Installation, Sleek Product, Sharp Pictures
customer_reviews.text: The product is as described and works excellently well. It send alerts for every motion detected while capturing a shot of the action. Installation is smarter than my other non-netvue cameras. You do not have to connect this camera to your router with an Ethernet cable before connecting wirelessly. The only downside is that the hex key to be used for adjustment was missing from the package. Because I didn't have to adjust the camera angle for now, the missing hex key is not a deal breaker. I will reach out to the seller for a replacement.
customer_reviews.author: FemBos

customer_reviews.title: Solid camera for the price
customer_reviews.text: The camera was easy to set up by scanning the QR code using the app on my phone. While the app is missing some functionality I would like (such as having a clip saved instead of just an image with the motion capture) it has the important stuff (sensitivity, volume, timers, etc). With the solid plastic construction I wouldn't want to expose it to the elements but for my use (outside but under the roof) it's perfect. There are some latency issues since I use wifi over a lan cable and it only supports 3G. Overall though it is an excellent camera with very good night vision.
customer_reviews.author: Tyler Pigott

customer_reviews.title: The best cameras for a great price!
customer_reviews.text: These cameras work great! They were very easy to set up just had to follow the step by step instructions and that was it. It’s great because you can set the camera sensitivity as well as have 2 way audio which is hard to find in a cheaper cameras. The night vision works great, clear to see, and I really like how I can just take quick snapshots or even record when I would like. I also enjoy the selection of different cloud services so there’s something tailored to your taste. These cameras have a great wide angle and will do great as a security system. I ordered two off the bat and will be purchasing a third here soon.
customer_reviews.author: Devin

customer_reviews.title: Worthless Motion Detection and Night Vision
customer_reviews.text: Long story short, Motion Detection is pretty much inexistent during night time, I have come close to about 10 feet away from it and would not catch any movement what so ever. However, it will catch all the bugs that will fly over the lense, literally every minute the motion detection notification will go off, but is nothing more than bugs flying around the camera. The night vision is terrible, the infrared reflection bounce back causing a mirror effect leaving two grey circles around the image, this creates difficulty to see the actual image.
customer_reviews.author: Vilmarie

customer_reviews.title: Bad app ! To control cameras
customer_reviews.text: I'm giving 1 star...as I'm reading the App. Review for this camera... ( some thing I did not ! Think about was problems with the app. That runs it ! Iv noticed there are zero... responses to the problems there encountering ! ) I'll post an updated review.. as I set this up. For better...? Or worse!
customer_reviews.author: alvena owen

customer_reviews.title: great security camera for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Was looking for an affordable security camera to help keep our family safe when I found this one i thought it was worth giving a try. very happy I did, i couldn't have asked for a better camera for the money, very clear picture day and night and with the motion detecting and 24 hour recording I can always see who or what is around my house as well as hear whats going on, very pleased with this camera and would reccomend this for anyone looking for a affordable outdoor security camera, The app works awsome!
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Eisenbacher

customer_reviews.title: You Get Your Money’s Worth
customer_reviews.text: I have tried a couple of cameras and this one has been the quickest to set up, the only one to reliably stay connected to my internet so far (4 weeks of use), and the only one to have decent English in their manual and app. Nice interface, useful sensitivity motion controls. Great value for your money. Only “Con” I have is I wish the power cable felt sturdier and that the wired internet port and the rest of connectors were detachable so you could drill a smaller hole. Still all of the pros far outweighs IMO these small cons so still 5 stars for me.
customer_reviews.author: Ernesto

customer_reviews.title: good build, bad audio and video
customer_reviews.text: This is the first security camera I bought. The night mode stops working on the second night. The build quality is very good for the price. Maybe, i just got a bad unit. The audio is terrible. The video is not good either. It doesn't come with the floodlight. The motion sensor is not good enough for my application. I am not sure though if other camera at the price range can do any better.
customer_reviews.author: bart

customer_reviews.title: Great cam for the price
customer_reviews.text: I was not expecting much from the cam at this low price. I wanted a cam that I could check on when away from home. I was pleasantly surprise how clear the picture is during the day. At night with little outdoor light, it was more then adequate to see in the dark. I am happy with this purchase, especially for this price range. I had it installed outside on the side of the house for nearly a month now and with 6 days straight of rain and thunderstorm, its working beautifully without any hitch. Highly recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: SP

customer_reviews.title: Great picture, not too hard to set up
customer_reviews.text: This is a great little camera for outdoors. The picture is clear day and night and decent sound quality. You have the option to talk in it but the speaker doesn't do a great job. It does require a plug and does not run on batteries. You have to have a 2.5 Mhz and most routers can generate one but it took me just a little while to figure that out. Not Netvue's issue necessarily but was worth noting for others who are reading this. Overall, I would recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: R Church

customer_reviews.title: I will buy again and again.
customer_reviews.text: My wife and I love Netvue cameras. I am an installer for a major alarm company and have been an installer for 24 years and even then for the price and quality Id choose Netvue every time. We have this one and will be picking up 2 more, 2 of the indoor cameras and 1 of the Orb ptz cameras. All work flawlessly and have fantastics clarity. My wife loves the ability to call up any of them on her Echo Spot as well with the Alexa skill.
customer_reviews.author: Ron J.

customer_reviews.title: Great outdoor camera, especially great value!
customer_reviews.text: I now have 5 of these cameras for outdoor use and they are fantastic values! Well built, great features, very good WiFi range. I use the memory card for storage and that feature is very slick. You will be pleased with these cameras, believe me. They have also recently branched out into PPE equipment (not on Amazon) but I regret to say they do not offer the same happy experience in that endeavor. They need to stick to security cameras, where they excel.....!
customer_reviews.author: JustMe

customer_reviews.title: Powerful device for a reasonable price.
customer_reviews.text: We bought a Netvue camera last year after some incidents that took place in front of our home. This little camera exceeded our expectations. Night vision is a definite plus when protecting yourself at night. The picture quality is great. Being able to communicate through the device has helped me to tell the hubby things while hes outside, lol. Now having the security and peace of mind with these cameras allow us to sleep more peacefully.
customer_reviews.author: Sauve Family

customer_reviews.title: Great Camera with Good Picture Quality
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install with the included guide for the screws to pre-drill. Connecting to the WiFi was simple enough following the instructions on the Netvue app. I was able to connect it to WiFi and to Alexa within 10 minutes and had it up and running in another 10min. It does require a plug, so make sure to buy some extra cable if the plug isn't right there on the porch or wherever you are installing it. Will definitely be getting another one for the side yard.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Watkins

customer_reviews.title: Short lived
customer_reviews.text: Although I purchased this product a while back, I did not take it out of the box and start using it until May of this year. Started off great with all features working fine and I was able to monitor what was getting into my garden. After about 6 weeks, moisture leaked in and despite following all instructions by the technical support and removing the glass and allowing to dry, I’m unable to get a clear picture back. I’m disappointed that an “outdoor” camera would be useless after getting exposed to moisture. I’m hoping for communication from the company, but have a hard time getting a response from emails and phone calls.
customer_reviews.author: Jean Niemann

customer_reviews.title: Won’t connect to WiFi
customer_reviews.text: Researched for a long time before selecting an outdoor camera. This one seemed to be what I needed. BUT it will NOT connect to the router. I’ve tried multiple times. Yes it’s a 2G. I’ve also called customer support many times, and no one answers. Instead you leave your information & “someone will call you back.” I’ve tried for 2 weeks and no one has called me back. I’m a single mom & there have been car break-ins in my neighborhood. I’m doing my best to protect my family, but a useless camera isn’t helping.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Forces you to pay a monthly subscription fee to use the camera, can't use your own software.
customer_reviews.text: This camera can't be added to existing non-netvue brand security software. You can ONLY use the proprietary software, and you don't have a choice if you want to pay for the service or not to use the camera. I paid for the device, and now I have to buy THEIR software too? No thanks, I'll be returning this. 0/10. What an underhanded way to do business.
customer_reviews.author: Julie

customer_reviews.title: Replacement up and running.
customer_reviews.text: I have generally been satisfied with the several Netvue products I have purchased. This camera could not function, despite a considerable amount of time spent with customer service. I returned the camera for a refund which was duly received. Netvue's customer service offered a replacement free of charge because of my earlier disappointment. I am happy to report that the new camera works very well, and Netvue's excellent picture is on a par with the best. So I must express my appreciation and complete satisfaction with the company and the device.
customer_reviews.author: George E. Carl

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality camera
customer_reviews.text: This is an absolutely horrific camera. Cannot make out the license plate of a car that is 15 feet in front of the camera. Is probably 100 feet off the road, but the lights from the cars still turn on the motion activation. Motion activation in the daytime is poor at best. Video playback work sometimes but not other times. All around I am super disappointed in this camera
customer_reviews.author: matthew

customer_reviews.title: LIKES AND DISLIKES
customer_reviews.text: LIKE: So with WiFi had no problem to power on and set up in seconds. Fairly solid construction, clean "HD" picture, and relatively easy angle adjustability. DISLIKES: Narrow viewing angle, HD-questionable, night vision (so-so) and least of all in order to plug indoors safely the wires have to be run through a large enough opening to get ALL 3 PRONGS in because they do not disconnect from the camera outdoors (ODD DESIGN FLAW). We ran the cords through the front door jam; super inconvenient. Other than that if you can live with all that and buying your own micro-SD for storage; you're golden!
customer_reviews.author: Aspen1is1

customer_reviews.title: A surveillance camera system doesn't have to be expensive to work well.
customer_reviews.text: This product is great. Right out of the box I had it up and going in the house. Then I installed outside. All good. Had a few questions about things so sent an email to customer support and got an answer in a few hours. Had another question and did a chat. Got an answer in minutes. Bought into the cloud system and am happy. I like having the ability to use a micro sd card if I want to host my own video. Very happy!
customer_reviews.author: Hotspyder33

customer_reviews.title: Easy install
customer_reviews.text: I bought some of the netvuw indoor cameras and love them so I picked up an outdoor one to go with it. It literally took me 20 mins to have it installed and running now keeping watch of my driveway. It hooks up to wifi like I did and there's an ethernet port there too. Picture is super clear and the camera can be shared to other netvue account members. Subscription service is available per device so it can get pricey for cloud storage. I'm doing some on the cloud and some with local microSD's. Hopefully it lasts so I can't review that piece right now.
customer_reviews.author: Vince L.

customer_reviews.title: Ease of use, works with all Alexa.
customer_reviews.text: Love this outdoor camera so far, does everything I need it to and nothing I don’t. Best part is it works with Alexa products. I can watch it on my tv full screen through fire tv and anytime there’s motion detected I get an alert on my watch, my iPhone, and it’s announced over my echo dots that there is motion detected at “camera name.” I like it so much I ordered a second one that was delivered today. Takes about 5 minuets to set up, New or adding to existing account.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremiah H.

customer_reviews.title: Good quality and works well
customer_reviews.text: We were looking for an easy and effective way to help my Mom keep an eye on her property. We found the answer in this camera. We currently have 3 of them and they work great. The app is very easy to use and allows you adjust the settings so you can either be notified for every movement or less. I would highly recommend this product. In addition, the service we received when we did have an issue was outstanding. They were responsive and solved the issue immediately.
customer_reviews.author: Nat

customer_reviews.title: Great Camera with Great Quality
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this camera to have eyes on the outside, i'm glad I did; it was a good investment. The camera quality is clear in daytime as well as at night. The speaker is clear. The camera was easy to install. I was having issues with getting alerts and contacted Netvue by chat and Kris was very knowledgeable and was able to help in correcting the issue. They offer cloud storage for a reasonable monthly fee. I have recommended this camera to family and friends. I love this camera.
customer_reviews.author: Godchild36

customer_reviews.title: Unreliable
customer_reviews.text: Camera is unreachable often times and repeatedly disconnects from the wifi. Motion detection doesn't always work. Playback timeline in software is riddled with ads and hard to figure out. Will not buy another Netvue.
customer_reviews.author: fineitaliandesign

customer_reviews.title: Superb Customer Service...Kris is the name. TY
customer_reviews.text: I initially had an issue not being able to connect the camera to my home wifi. Tried it several times and didn’t worked. So I clicked on chat taking my chance that somebody might answer. And luckily Kris responded and walk me through resolving the issue...Firmware have to be updated on my Vigil device. Very professional, knowledgeable & patient. The camera is not bad at all. I just want to note that the view is steady on one spot, you cannot rotate it. If you want a rotating camera, that’s a different model, which I was wanting. But this one is okay too...I bought 2 anyway, so I have 2 different angles.
customer_reviews.author: RIG

customer_reviews.title: Get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: Love hate relationship. Great night vision and interface, but the cameras fail to record so much of the time, there is no fast forward feature, and they constantly disconnect from the internet. I even have then hardwired into my router with no luck. Every time they go out it's a crap shoot to crawl through our very small attic to try and get to the reset button. Not a great design overall.
customer_reviews.author: Austin

customer_reviews.title: Smudged image and crazy number of false movement images.
customer_reviews.text: Installation was fine and most of the image quality is ok. However, there is a smudge in the middle I can't get rid of and about 10-20 times a day it sends a notice of movement and takes a picture of a host streak across the area (see image) Dan and night, so it isn't like it is sunlight. No idea what it is, but I don't think I have that many active ghosts. With the notification so frequent, I have to stop paying attention to them, which defeats the purpose. Returning the product.
customer_reviews.author: Sean Curley

customer_reviews.title: Notification does not work
customer_reviews.text: Everything started out well with this camera. Easy to setup and install, good quality picture and motion detection. But could not get it to send notifications when the motion detection went off.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Duggan

customer_reviews.title: Once setup, works well
customer_reviews.text: Getting it configured for wifi was very challenging. Had issues getting SD card to mount and format. Took several hours with multiple attempts to get it setup properly. Now that it's done and working, I am happy with the performance. Night vision is pretty good. Monitoring driveway, watching cars 30 ft from the camera. For the price, its a good device, just wish the setup was easier.
customer_reviews.author: mark mahder

customer_reviews.title: Forcing you to subscribe
customer_reviews.text: After 2 weeks the phone app will not allow me to see motion detection video without a subscription. It is now just a series of still pictures. You can use playback but I don't see a way to pause the video. The company is forcing you to pay for an unwanted service to maintain this feature. I would rather just use my micro SD card. Also, night vision is sub-par for moving objects. When motion detection captures people walking along our front path they are blurred. During the day it is much better.
customer_reviews.author: Kona

customer_reviews.title: One worked out of the box, not the other...
customer_reviews.text: Ordered two, one worked, the other didn’t. Tech support supposed to be sending a replacement. Will update review when I get two that work, until then, you only get half the stars. EDIT: the one I kept I finally installed - quick and easy setup, clear picture, easy to connect to the app and easy to sync with Alexa and my Fire TV. Quite a useful camera - motion detection works, nightvision is clear - I already bought another one! Would recommend for a DIY person to set up a simple, effective security system.
customer_reviews.author: Importracr317

customer_reviews.title: Decent camera for the money.
customer_reviews.text: This is the fifth outdoor wifi camera I got to keep an eye on things around our house. It is one of the easier cameras to install and set up. It has been pretty reliable, only dropping out maybe 3 or 4 times causing me to 'turn it off and back on again'. Netvue does charge for cloud image storage after the first month of use, though you can still call up and save images onto your cell phone to bounce onto some other storage like a 'security cam folder'. Definitely worth a try.
customer_reviews.author: dave

customer_reviews.title: Just bought my 3rd camera
customer_reviews.text: Great product for the price. I run mine through WiFi and do not use the cloud. I have an SD card. App is easy to use and very intuitive. My only complaint is the motion section. Flying nats, snow, rain all set it off.....a little algorithm work still needed. Still very happy with product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: By Far, THE BEST
customer_reviews.text: This is my 10th Netvue camera I installed and utilize for both home and business. The quality is superb, the reliability is unsurpassed and the ease of use is fantastic. Every camera gives me exactly what i need and makes it so easy to see its history or live action. The motion sensor just adds to the security and is so easy to set up. You won't go wrong with Netvue because not only do they have the best cameras, but their support is magnificent. No waiting, instant results.
customer_reviews.author: Bob

customer_reviews.title: Not connection
customer_reviews.text: Is terrible not the connection is hard many times it doesn’t work I will trying and trying and nothing now I have through it in the garbage because still is not connection, I call to the technician support just what nothing don’t buy it is not good
customer_reviews.author: Marlin I.

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price
customer_reviews.text: Overall picture is pretty clear. For installation, make sure antenna is attached and you are near your router. Flexible that you can angle the camera whichever way to face what you want. Biggest issue for me is the lag when something is moving in front of it. When people walk to/from the house it starts to lag. Not a fan of this if you want to keep your eye on something in real time. My wifi signal is 96/100 so I know it isn't a connectivity issue.
customer_reviews.author: TheUltimateSteiner

customer_reviews.title: 1080p outdoor security camera
customer_reviews.text: I hooked it up this morning when it arrived. Very easy to install. Nice quality material.It works with my Alexa ( I have all throughout my home) to show me activity. It’s even Wi-Fi Enabled . It will record 24/7 continuous video and upload to the cloud. It even has A Micro SD card storage.
customer_reviews.author: thomas edens

customer_reviews.title: Terrible Support; Horrible Amazon integration
customer_reviews.text: If you plan on using this with an Amazon device DO NOT BUY THIS. It is so unreliable and Is basically useless with Amazon devices. My Camera completely stopped working with Alexa and when I contact support they say that they’re on “Holiday” and will get back sometime. LOL
customer_reviews.author: Bingbong

customer_reviews.title: great so far but motion issues
customer_reviews.text: perfect camera, I have 3 of these inside my home now I bought the outdoor version. so love I love it. it was very easy to install. very easy to add to my already downloaded netvue app. my only issue is that it was recording motion and reporting emotion however it stopped doing both I had set the sensitivity very high and it's not very good about predicting motion.
customer_reviews.author: shane

customer_reviews.title: Very good  functionality and customer support
customer_reviews.text: I have two Netvue Vigil cameras on my property. Theses cameras provide clear pictures and video both on the day and night mode. The customer service is great especially working with Anna. Using the customer support feature on the home page I found works great. It took a few days of communication to resolve a issue with one of my cameras but a replacement was sent after 6 months in use. I am very pleased with the camera functionality and the customer support.
customer_reviews.author: blackhawk54

customer_reviews.title: Very satisfied with this purchase!
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy with this Outdoor Security Camera. Was easy to install and have gotten great results. I signed up for the Beta human detection and it really works! I had purchased another brand similar to this one but it kept going offline and had so much trouble, so I returned and purchased this one. Went offline once during a storm and I had no problem getting it back online. For the price it is definitely worth it. Depending how you set up your alerts, I can be at the store and receive an alert!
customer_reviews.author: M C

customer_reviews.title: Great picture and video!
customer_reviews.text: Just received it. The alerts are very quick and the picture clarity is great in the daytime. Night vision can be better, but still does its job of alerting you. For the money it is perfect. Very easy installation. I plan on buying another one for my backyard. It picks up everything so set your alerts at a decent modification that is right for you. Sound quality is great. While I was at work, I checked my video and could see and hear the people talking while walking past my house.
customer_reviews.author: Tiara

customer_reviews.title: Dont buy this one!
customer_reviews.text: This is horrible. It only records up to 12 seconds... half of those are played back as a black screen. I called company to see if something was set incorrectly and was told it was fine.
customer_reviews.author: Karen MacNeil

customer_reviews.title: Clear Monitoring Day & Night saving Horses
customer_reviews.text: Tried several brands for this Horse Rescue facility. Needed Night IR mostly, but the daytime view is excellent as is the Audio. Building out the system thanks to donations from caring Horse patrons. Photo is on a Echo-Show 2nd gen. Looks good on a Show 1st gen also. ( $50 as a Referb sale). Didn't need motion as the animals move constantly. Distance here is about 30ft. to back side of stall.
customer_reviews.author: McMaster

customer_reviews.title: WiFi, Motion Detection, and Sleep Masks????
customer_reviews.text: This review is long overdue. This camera does not connect to WiFi and the motion detection worked for ONE day. I’m extremely disappointed. Also, there are reviews for “sleep masks” on this item.... ratings for an unrelated product should NOT be included in your overall rating. Again, disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: sagean

customer_reviews.title: Only one person can view the videos at a time... disappointing
customer_reviews.text: The night vision and motion detection is great, but there are 3 of us who would like the opportunity to review the videos. There is no information in the sales info that indicate you can have only one person logged in at a time. My d-link camera allows multiple log-ins and is very easy to set up. Disappointingly, only one person can review the videos on this camera at a time. Very inconvenient. The instructions refer to the log-in issue as "security". :-(
customer_reviews.author: Tricia Guy

customer_reviews.title: If these are hard to set up for you..  my 6 year old nephew needs summer jobs to buy a new bike
customer_reviews.text: Your joking, these took 3 min to set up. 4 min to hang up, 3 or 4 min to adjust the angle and it beats the hell out of the 4 camera DVR set up I bought for 300 bucks with half as good of quality replay. I got 5 of these for about 200 dollars and had all 5 set up and adjusted in two hours. But Im also not a nit wit. (And had power already ran from the cameras I took down lol)
customer_reviews.author: J-bone

customer_reviews.title: Great Camera with light / Flawed for night-time dark setting.
customer_reviews.text: Good Camera for daytime. I would've given it 5 stars but does not have good picture for night time. that's the only flaw. If the area you place this camera has some light it works well. I have this on my back patio and picks up very little at night with no light. daytime picture is excellent in 1080P sensor works extremely well and it was easy to install and works easily with my netvue app. Good camera for the price but truly has a night-time flaw.
customer_reviews.author: JESUS J.

customer_reviews.title: GREAT CAMERA! Excellent picture quality.
customer_reviews.text: Great camera! Picture is very clear, even at night. With just the coach lights on either side of the garage, the camera is very clear. Motion detection works great, took a bit of playing with the sensitivity settings to get it dialed in. Overall, very pleased with the cost vs performance so far. Very easy to install and hook up. Will be purchasing a couple more in the near future.
customer_reviews.author: dplpilot

customer_reviews.title: Great Neighborly unwanted activity deterrent
customer_reviews.text: The price is outstanding for the for the superiority of picture, motion and night vision. The ability to monitor my son arriving home daily from school is one less thing to be concerned about during our busy lives. Alert coming across your phone for any activity is great. We had neighbors that would bring their dogs across the street near our home and glass for the bathroom, the camera has stop all of activity. I’m going to purchase two more for my mother’s home.
customer_reviews.author: cherry24

customer_reviews.title: Camera works great
customer_reviews.text: If you're looking for ip bullet camera this is the one. I bought this one back in August and it has gone through a lot outside moved around to various spots, extremely bad weather Banged bumped end bent a lot and it still works great the best part is I've tried other cameras here at Amazon and have bought three other ones that I could not believe how bad the apps for were. I have never had a problem with this app it always works.
customer_reviews.author: Richard hermansen

customer_reviews.title: The Netvue Support Team is Outstanding
customer_reviews.text: I am really pleased with my new Netvue Vigil. While setting it up, I had trouble getting it to connect to the Netvue server, but working with their customer service I was able to get it connected. I will say their customer service is excellent particularly their online chat team. The “daytime” picture is outstanding and the night view is excellent. I have read some post that there is a lag in the pictures and voice, however there doesn’t seem to be a lag with my Vigil.
customer_reviews.author: Bassman

customer_reviews.title: Great picture quality! Excellent product for the price!
customer_reviews.text: We installed this camera over our front door in a matter of minutes. The app was easy to install on my iPad and the steps for set up were clear and simple to follow. The microphone is loud and it is easy to hear the person. The picture quality is excellent. I am really impressed with the night vision for the price of this camera. In my opinion it is better than much more expensive versions. It suits my needs perfectly and I would recommend this product to anyone. I like being able to see and speak to whoever is outside. Good product.
customer_reviews.author: Shelley.M.

customer_reviews.title: Great security camera! Bought three!
customer_reviews.text: Fast delivery. Installing it didn’t take much time at all. The initial setup and connecting it to my WiFi took a little longer than I would like, but at the end I finally got it done after connecting it directly to my router through the LAN. Picture is great. I really like the motion zone feature in the app. Update: I really liked this camera so well that I bought two more cameras! Now I have my front yard, back yard and garage area under surveillance. And I can check on all three of them in the same app without having to switch between several apps.
customer_reviews.author: Wael

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This camera is amazing!!! Clear images. I live far off the road and night vision picks up clear and far at least 90 feet. Motion detector can be adjusted for sensitivity. Audio is amazingly clear. For the money it’s unbelievable. I’m planning on buying another. Set up is extremely easy very good directions. You won’t regret buying it.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra Haws

customer_reviews.title: Great deal
customer_reviews.text: We recently upgraded our indoor cameras and figured we’d add an outdoor. The only negative I have is while the audio on the indoor cameras was fine, the audio on this one has a lot of feedback sometimes. The app is easy to use for all of the cameras, which is great. The outdoor camera took a little more time to figure out how to actually install, but the set up itself was super easy.
customer_reviews.author: Socks

customer_reviews.title: Perfect security camera
customer_reviews.text: I just got my NETVUE camera and I'm really impressed with how perfect it is. Perfect box, everything we need is in the box, even a drill bit. Wifi installation is easy, just need to be a 2.4ghz. Power cable is long. Video quality is awesome, bright colors. Sound is perfect as well. Mobile app makes everything easier to use. Camera is all metal, not plastic like others. I'm very satisfy with my new camera and I would recommend it to my friends.
customer_reviews.author: Marcus Alvarenga

customer_reviews.title: Best camera. Love love love this camera
customer_reviews.text: This is an awesome camera. After ordering 3 other brands finally got a winner. I don’t have to use the sd card slot if I don’t want to. It has cloud storage and I’m able to see everything very clearly day and night. The audio is exceptional. Better than my expensive cameras I got a few years ago. Love love love this camera. So far it’s holding up in the direct Florida everyday rain. I will know in a few days if it’s going to hold up through more rain. So far so good. Best camera ever love it
customer_reviews.author: Faith Allen

customer_reviews.title: Update took away features that we bought camera for!
customer_reviews.text: This WAS a good camera until the app updated. When we bought this device you could adjust the sensitivity of the camera. That's what we PAID for. Now since the update they took that away and you have to PAY for it! Sorry but that is bull!!! Was going to buy a few more but will get something else instead. This is bad business.
customer_reviews.author: Misty Rogers

product_meta.title: Outdoor Camera - 1080P Security Camera Outdoor, IP66 Waterproof, 2-Way Audio Home Security Camera, 2.4GHz Wi-Fi with A.I. Motion Detection Night Vision, Cloud Storage/TF Card Work with Alexa
feature_bullets: SMART MOTION DETECT & ALERT - NETVUE security camera outdoor schedulable motion detection, motion recording and real-time motion alert via APP, upload snapshots and videos, motion sensibility adjustment, accurate and smart motion detection less false alarm. Equip with AI, effectively avoids “false positives” caused by pets, winds or leaves. When motion detected, motion video is triggered and Smart Clip starts recording. If human detected in the video, Netvue App will alert you immediately.

FHD 1080P & 60 FEET NIGHT VISION - NETVUE motion sensor camera with night vision is built with an 1080P FHD camera that provides you with clear and crisp recordings that you can watch remotely in real-time through the mobile app NETVUE thanks to the 36mm lens of this outdoor security camera, which also offers a 100° viewing angle. In addition, you can get Live FHD Video during the day and night through its infrared LEDs, allowing you to see up to 60 feet of video even in the pitch-dark.

COMPATIABLE WITH WIFI / ETHERNET & ALEXA - NETVUE outdoor security camera wireless works perfectly when connected to a 2. 4GHz Wi-Fi or Ethernet cable (2.4GHz Wi-Fi network only, not for 5.0GHz). Moreover, this outdoor surveillance camera is compatible with Alexa, Echo Show, Echo Spot, or Fire TV. Please kindly note that this Wi-Fi camera requires a wall plug and is NOT battery powered. Power Adapter is included.

CLOUD STORAGE & PRIVACY PROTECTION - NETVUE ip camera wireless outdoor uses AWS(Amazon Web Services) Cloud to provide up to 30 days of cloud storage. Or, record continuously to a MicroSD card (not included,up to 128GB) regardless of motion and sound. Both can replay 14 days videos. Also, this surveillance camera will secure your data storage and every significant moment, protect your privacy with bank-level AES 256-bit encryption and TLS Encryption Protocol.

2-WAY AUDIO & IP66 WATERPROOF - With clear two-way audio, this wifi outdoor camera with audio and app allows you to have real-time conversation with your family members or pets like talking on a phone. Moreover, NETVUE IP66 professional outdoor camera wifi, temperature ranges from -4°F to 122°F (-20°C to 50°C), which means the motion security camera is strong enough to withstand rough weather and Vandal Resistant, even in the storm and snowy weather.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.3 out of 5 stars2,367 ratings4.3 out of 5 stars
